messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Penn & Teller
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/31/05 7:39:29 PM, salten@comcast.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/31/05 7:39:29 PM, salten@... writes:

<< Netflix has their "bullshit" series on DVD. It's pretty amusing. >>

I ordered the first season used while I was at Amazon.
Holly won't remember that first series at all (Behind the Scenes). Kirby
definitely will. Marty probably.

I'm really excited about getting to show a couple of scenes in particular to
Holly.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Penn & Teller
messages.msgSnippet: I don t have cable, but when it s on DVD I d love to see it.  They did a fantastic series for PBS years ago called Behind the Scenes. I taped some, and last
messages.messageBody:
I don't have cable, but when it's on DVD I'd love to see it. They did a
fantastic series for PBS years ago called "Behind the Scenes." I taped some, and
last time I checked they weren't on DVD yet. They were on music, sculpture,
perspective...


EEEK!!!

Editorial Reviews
From the Back Cover
Hosted by magicians Penn and Teller, this award-winning series goes behind
the scenes to discover the creative process with renowned artists: David
Hockney, Julie Taymor, Wayne Thiebaud, Matt Groening, David Parsons, JoAnn Falletta,
Robert Gil de Montes, Carrie Mae Weems, William Wegman, Allen Toussaint, Bobby
McFerrin, Nancy Graves, and Max Roach.

Amazon has it.

I have to go order it right now.

Sandra

messages.subject: Penn & Teller
messages.msgSnippet: I was curious...does anyone else here watch Penn & Teller s show on Showtime?  I ve been watching it for a while and really enjoy it -- recently the kids
messages.messageBody:
I was curious...does anyone else here watch Penn & Teller's show on Showtime? I've been watching it for a while and really enjoy it -- recently the kids started watching it with me and we have had some great discussions based upon the themes of the show. Last night the show was about colleges: http://www.sho.com/site/ptbs/topics.do?topic=college -- was just wondering if anyone else here is a fan of the show.

Brandie
